SEARCH
Package api.equinix.javasdk.networkedge.client

Interface DeviceLinks

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeviceLinksImpl
public interface DeviceLinks
Client interface for managing device link groups on Network Edge. Provides operations to list, retrieve, and create device links that establish connectivity between virtual devices across metros.
Version:
$Id: $Id
Author:
ianjones
